text: Sierra Renee Thomas (born on May 24, 1989), also known as Sierra Whitehead Thomas and Sierra Gates, is an American television personality, founder and CEO. == Career == Sierra stars in the television show Love & Hip Hop: Atlanta. == Early life == Sierra has two sisters, who are twins named Camille and Kim. She is of African American descent. == Personal life == Sierra met Shooter Gates when she was only 17 and he was 27, they began a romantic relationship together. She married Shooter Gates in 2010. They have two children together named Paris and Mason, she had her daughter Paris when she was 15 years old, and had her son Mason in 2010 at 21 years old. In 2021, Sierra got engaged with Eric Whitehead on Christmas Day. Then they got married in 2022. One year later, they finalized their divorced. On May 26, 2024, Sierra and Xzavia got engaged. Three months after their engagement, Sierra and Xzavia got married in September 4, 2024. Category:Living people Category:1989 births Category:American television personalities Category:People from Georgia (U.S. state)
title: Sierra Gates
